item.title: (WIP) How to play Dwarf Fortress (in fortress mode)
item.description: https://df-walkthrough.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Navigating left hand should sit on keys 1 to 4. right hand should sit on keys 6 to 9. pinkies navigate bottom left to top right. index fingers navigate top left to bottom right Reviews Post your emacs(Screenshot) here. : emacs It's cool that you want to learn Dwarf Fortress, just be aware that it's very buggy. The hardcore fans also greatly exaggerate how interesting and complex it is.
